# Test: grove add runs multiple hooks successfully
setup_workspace

cp $WORK/grove-hooks-multi.toml .grove.toml

exec grove add feature/multi-hook
stderr 'Running 2 hook'
stderr 'Created worktree at .*[/\\]feature-multi-hook'
exists ../feature-multi-hook/.hook1
exists ../feature-multi-hook/.hook2

-- grove-hooks-multi.toml --
[hooks]
add = ["touch .hook1", "touch .hook2"]
